name: fish are nice
description:
A fishing-birthday game? It's your birthday Amanda! All of your friends are at the park to celebrate & fish with you (yay)! It's time to party - so eat some food, catch some fish & chat with your crush.

There is no end goal for this game - it is intended to be a life simulator/RPG, similar to animal crossing. Enjoy talking with your friends, fishing for the catch of the day & snacking on all of the food someone left laying around the park!

Features:

 First & third person camera options!  Cool interactable inventory!  Multiple character dialogue!  Fun fishing simulator!

 Friends with party hats!

*Not playable on mobile devices!

[ SFX: Casual SFX / Dialog Text / Platformer LITE ]

Special mentions: To the birthday bean, Amanda!!! Happy Birthday! :~)

Dev note 25/5/22: The inventory system currently isn't working on package, so will update in future when I can figure out what the problem is! :~( Unfortunately, that means a lot of functions for this game are currently inaccessible. Many apologies - please enjoy the art & music for now!
